summary: Desperate to get out from under her overprotective mother, a home-schooled teen runs off to live with her dad, and forms a bond with his much-younger boyfriend.
cast: Anna Gunn|Ashley Rickards|Martin Spanjers|Drew Droege|Rene Rosado|Carlos Pratts|Jenny O'Hara|Diedrich Bader|Maynor Alvarado|Soledad St. Hilaire|Sabrena No'mani|Angie Teodora Dick|M.D. Walton|Haley Joel Osment|Shanna Collins|Shanica Knowles|Tara Jean O'Brien|Brenan Baird|Austin Rogers|Aaron Perilo|Keith Page|Mathew Botuchis|Jenna Kanell|Jennifer Robertson|Tara Karsian|Anthony Gaudioso|Brian Guy|Maria Lazam Hanson|Matthew McKelligon|Candace McKinney
keywords: overbearing mother|job interview|new job|older man younger man relationship|home schooling
title: Sassy Pants
